title: Mathieu van der Poel on Rivalry with Wout van Aert Ahead of CX Clash: ‘He is More of a Rival than a Friend’
content:
Van der Poel and Van Aert face off for the first time this season at Mol: 'You always know that you have to be 110 percent to beat Wout.'

Read the full article at Mathieu van der Poel on Rivalry with Wout van Aert Ahead of CX Clash: ‘He is More of a Rival than a Friend’ on Velo.
author: ahood
